Class Tripod

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--Primitive
        |
        +--Tripod
All Implemented Interfaces:
Location
public class Tripod
extends Primitive

Draws a fix cordinate system at the origin. I used in in the begining to maintain my orientation before the stars. Now obsolete, as it seems to confuse the users. However, if movement seems erratic, the cordinate system is a nice and handy reference point in debugging.
